SELECT d.dept_name as name, IFNULL(sum(temp.count),0) AS count FROM ( SELECT company_id, IFNULL(sum( count ),0) AS count FROM t_code_record GROUP BY company_id HAVING COUNT( company_id ) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT company_id, IFNULL(sum( count ),0) AS count FROM t_code_single GROUP BY company_id HAVING COUNT( company_id ) > 0 UNION ALL SELECT company_id, IFNULL(sum( count ),0) AS count FROM t_code_acc_record GROUP BY company_id HAVING COUNT( company_id ) > 0 ) temp LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON temp.company_id = d.dept_id WHERE d.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY temp.company_id ORDER BY count asc LIMIT 10
